comment: The Cauchy condensation test. If ` a ( k ) ` is a decreasing sequence of nonnegative terms, then ` sum_ k e. NN a ( k ) ` converges iff ` sum_ n e. NN0 2 ^ n x. a ( 2 ^ n ) ` converges. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Jul-2014.) (Proof shortened by AV, 10-Jul-2022.)
